titles: The booke of martyrs· VVherein are set downe the names of such martyrs as suffered persecution, and laid downe theire lives for witnesse-bearing unto the Gospell of Christ Jesus; drawne downe from the primitive Church, to these later times, especially respecting such as have suffered in this land under the tyranny of Antichrist, in opposition to popish errours.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
notes: Running title reads: A catalogue of martyrs.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
A3r stained; ill. not filmed. Quire A of British Library copy filmed at end.
